name: Mushroom Quest (itch) (Seamajesty)
description:
This is a game where you are a mushroom boy who has to save the mushroom forest from goblins who are attacking. Can you beat the final boss and save the mushroom forest?

Credits:

Thanks to my sister, for drawing the player and goblin king sprites.

Thanks to FMA artists that keep music free:

Ketsa, Maarten Schellekens, Serge Quadrado.
